metadata.name: Bacmin 4 381 μg ml Injection solution concentrate

clinical_particulars.therapeutic_indications: Manganese gluconate is currently only available in combination products It is indicated for the prophylactic or nutritional supplementation of DB06757 FDA Label

contraindications.pharmacodynamics: Manganese gluconate is a salt which dissociates in body fluids to form manganese and gluconic acid Its pharmacological effects are due to the normal role of DB06757 in the body
